```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidycensus)
library(dplyr)

```


```{r genindex, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

bmore_hhinc12 <- get_acs(
  geography = "tract", 
  variables = "B19013_001",
  state = "MD", 
  county = "Baltimore City",
  year = 2012,
  geometry = TRUE 
) %>%
  select(GEOID, estimate) %>%
  rename(est12 = estimate)

bmore_medhhinc12 <- bmore_hhinc12 %>%
  summarise(med(est12))

bmore_hhinc22 <- get_acs(
  geography = "tract", 
  variables = "B19013_001",
  state = "MD", 
  county = "Baltimore City",
  year = 2022,
  geometry = FALSE 
) %>%
  select(GEOID, estimate) %>%
  rename(est22 = estimate)

bmore_hhinc_change <- left_join(bmore_hhinc12, bmore_hhinc22, by = "GEOID")



```
